name: The Inkwell
description:
Descend into a mysterious system of structures beneath a desert island.

Developed in 4 weeks for a walking simulator assignment at university. The game should take 10-15 minutes to complete.

Controls:
  • W/A/S/D: movement
  • Mouse: look around
  • Space: jump
  • Left control: crouch
  • Right mouse button: zoom
Requirements:
  • 64-bit OS (Windows and Linux)
  • DirectX 11-compatible GPU (Windows and Linux), Metal-compatible macOS device
